encounters.json: You stand on a sandy ledge overlooking a subterranean gulf of darkness to the east. The ledge is wide but rough. Sand, rocky debris, and the bones of small animals cover it. A rickety, old wooden bridge crosses the dark chasm to another rocky ledge. On the far rocky ledge you can vaguely see the entrance to a shadowy cave.
You peer inside the cave in the rocky bluff. As you eyes adjust to the darkness, you see a stone door set in the wall. It's closed, but there appears to be some sort of mechanism to the door's side.
A light wind is everpresent in the tall bluffs on the Great Plateau.
A rickety bridge sways in the wind in front of you.
You here a strange crunch as you walk across the plateau. Your foot has cracked open a dried bone, some sort of femur. The area ahead is obscured by a number of short rock formations.
